name: Individual Composition and/or Production Lesson
description: A private, one-hour, one-on-one composition or production lesson with Vincent Giles, to be organised via email after purchase. You will be able to download a "voucher" because that's what the shop needs.

name: Bass Guitar Dexterity Exercise
description: This is a set of three exercises to build strength, dexterity, and independence for an electric bass player's fretting hand. This is designed for a four-stringed, fretted bass guitar.

name: Rhythm Hierarchy Worksheet
description: This worksheet shows an approach to hierarchy of rhythm, shown in split voices to allow potential polyphonic playing to solidify cross-rhythmic feel. This is aimed at bass players (and is in the bass clef), but can be used for any purpose where this type of rhythmic subdivision needs to be understood and eventually internalised.

name: Bass Guitar Modes Theory and Practice with Tetrachords
description: It is my belief that one of the best ways to learn is to learn how to learn. This guide stacks multiple somewhat advanced concepts on top of each other, so that the learner can self-direct their way through the worksheets, building on foundational skills and concepts and adding additionally more complex layers of knowledge and practice.
